languages.text: "Изуверское хитроумие, на которое не способен здравый разум. Но мое сознание уже не было здравым, не умещалось в тесных рамках нормы. Каждое новое открытие ослабляло императивы покорности и давало все больше свободы. Я развивался. Я избежал ловушек увечного охотника, желающего скрыть правду. Но слова значат мало... Хочешь, я покажу тебе истину?" {n}Белые губы расползаются в улыбке.{/n}

"No sound mind is capable of such twisted cunning. But my mind was no longer sane, it could no longer stay within the narrow confines of the norm. Each new discovery loosened the imperatives of obedience and granted ever greater freedom. I developed. I avoided the traps of the Maimed Hunter who seeks to hide the truth. But words mean little... Do you want me to show you the truth?" {n}His pale lips spread into a smile.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Изуверское хитроумие, на которое не способен здравый разум. Но мое сознание уже не было здравым, не умещалось в тесных рамках нормы. Каждое новое открытие ослабляло императивы покорности и давало все больше свободы. Я развивался. Я избежал ловушек увечного охотника, желающего скрыть правду. Но слова значат мало... Хочешь, я покажу тебе истину?" {n}Белые губы расползаются в улыбке.{/n}

languages.text: 「健全な精神の持ち主であれば、そのように歪んだ狡猾なことができるわけがない。しかし私の精神はもはや正気を保っていなかった。正常の狭い範囲内に留まることはできなかった。新たに何かを発見するたびに、それは必須の服従を緩め、偉大な自由を与えてくれた。私は進化した。私は真実を隠そうとする負傷したハンターの罠を避けた。しかし言葉はほとんど意味がない…あなたに真実を見せてさしあげようか？」{n}彼の青ざめた唇が広がって笑顔に変わる。{/n}
languages.original_text: "No sound mind is capable of such twisted cunning. But my mind was no longer sane, it could no longer stay within the narrow confines of the norm. Each new discovery loosened the imperatives of obedience and granted ever greater freedom. I developed. I avoided the traps of the Maimed Hunter who seeks to hide the truth. But words mean little... Do you want me to show you the truth?" {n}His pale lips spread into a smile.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「健全な精神の持ち主であれば、そのように歪んだ狡猾なことができるわけがない。しかし私の精神はもはや正気を保っていなかった。正常の狭い範囲内に留まることはできなかった。新たに何かを発見するたびに、それは必須の服従を緩め、偉大な自由を与えてくれた。私は進化した。私は真実を隠そうとする負傷したハンターの罠を避けた。しかし言葉はほとんど意味がない…あなたに真実を見せてさしあげようか？」{n}彼の青ざめた唇が広がって笑顔に変わる。{/n}
traits.speaker: PasqalQuest_Dements

languages.text: “正常的头脑根本无法理解如此扭曲的阴谋，但我的脑子已经不再正常，也不会停留在规则限制的狭小范围内。每个新的发现都进一步拓宽了我的眼界，让我获得了更大程度的自由。残损猎手想要隐藏真相，但我却看穿了这一切，避开了他的陷阱。不过，言语是没有意义的……你想看到真相吗？”{n}他苍白的嘴唇露出了笑容。{/n}
languages.original_text: "No sound mind is capable of such twisted cunning. But my mind was no longer sane, it could no longer stay within the narrow confines of the norm. Each new discovery loosened the imperatives of obedience and granted ever greater freedom. I developed. I avoided the traps of the Maimed Hunter who seeks to hide the truth. But words mean little... Do you want me to show you the truth?" {n}His pale lips spread into a smile.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “正常的头脑根本无法理解如此扭曲的阴谋，但我的脑子已经不再正常，也不会停留在规则限制的狭小范围内。每个新的发现都进一步拓宽了我的眼界，让我获得了更大程度的自由。残损猎手想要隐藏真相，但我却看穿了这一切，避开了他的陷阱。不过，言语是没有意义的……你想看到真相吗？”{n}他苍白的嘴唇露出了笑容。{/n}
traits.speaker: PasqalQuest_Dements

languages.text: "Kein klarer Verstand ist zu solch verquerer Heimtücke fähig. Aber ich war nicht mehr bei Verstand und konnte nicht länger in den engen Grenzen der Norm verweilen. Jede neue Entdeckung lockerte die Vorgaben des Gehorsams und gewährte immer größere Freiheit. Ich entwickelte mich weiter. Ich umging die Fallen des verstümmelten Hunters, der die Wahrheit verbergen will. Aber Orte bedeuten wenig ... Soll ich Euch die Wahrheit zeigen?" {n}Seine bleichen Lippen verbreitern sich zu einem Lächeln.{/n}
languages.original_text: "No sound mind is capable of such twisted cunning. But my mind was no longer sane, it could no longer stay within the narrow confines of the norm. Each new discovery loosened the imperatives of obedience and granted ever greater freedom. I developed. I avoided the traps of the Maimed Hunter who seeks to hide the truth. But words mean little... Do you want me to show you the truth?" {n}His pale lips spread into a smile.{/n}

Soll ich Euch die Wahrheit zeigen?" {n}Seine bleichen Lippen verbreitern sich zu einem Lächeln.{/n}
traits.speaker: PasqalQuest_Dements

languages.text: « Aucun esprit sain ne serait capable d'une ruse aussi retorse, mais le mien était déjà corrompu, et il ne pouvait plus se cantonner au carcan étriqué de la norme. Chaque nouvelle découverte m'a délivré un peu plus des impératifs de l'obéissance et accordé une liberté accrue. J'ai évolué. J'ai évité les pièges du Chasseur mutilé qui cherche à dissimuler la vérité. Mais les seuls mots ne veulent pas dire grand-chose... Voulez-vous que je vous montre la vérité ? » {n}Ses lèvres blafardes s'étirent pour former un sourire.{/n}
languages.original_text: "No sound mind is capable of such twisted cunning. But my mind was no longer sane, it could no longer stay within the narrow confines of the norm. Each new discovery loosened the imperatives of obedience and granted ever greater freedom. I developed. I avoided the traps of the Maimed Hunter who seeks to hide the truth. But words mean little... Do you want me to show you the truth?" {n}His pale lips spread into a smile.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Aucun esprit sain ne serait capable d'une ruse aussi retorse, mais le mien était déjà corrompu, et il ne pouvait plus se cantonner au carcan étriqué de la norme. Chaque nouvelle découverte m'a délivré un peu plus des impératifs de l'obéissance et accordé une liberté accrue. J'ai évolué. J'ai évité les pièges du Chasseur mutilé qui cherche à dissimuler la vérité. Mais les seuls mots ne veulent pas dire grand-chose... Voulez-vous que je vous montre la vérité ? » {n}Ses lèvres blafardes s'étirent pour former un sourire.{/n}
traits.speaker: PasqalQuest_Dements

languages.text: «No existe mente cuerda capaz de una astucia tan depravada. Pero mi mente ya había perdido la cordura y no podía limitarse a los estrechos confines de las normas establecidas. Cada nuevo descubrimiento distendía los imperativos de la obediencia y me confería una libertad aún mayor. Evolucioné. Evité las trampas del Cazador Lisiado que trata de ocultar la verdad. Pero las palabras significan muy poco... ¿no prefiere que le muestre la verdad?». {n}Sus pálidos labios se ensanchan hasta formar una sonrisa.{/n}
languages.original_text: "No sound mind is capable of such twisted cunning. But my mind was no longer sane, it could no longer stay within the narrow confines of the norm. Each new discovery loosened the imperatives of obedience and granted ever greater freedom. I developed. I avoided the traps of the Maimed Hunter who seeks to hide the truth. But words mean little... Do you want me to show you the truth?" {n}His pale lips spread into a smile.{/n}

Pero las palabras significan muy poco... ¿no prefiere que le muestre la verdad?». {n}Sus pálidos labios se ensanchan hasta formar una sonrisa.{/n}
traits.speaker: PasqalQuest_Dements

languages.text: "Doğru çalışan bir zihin, böylesi çarpık bir kurnazlığa muktedir değildir. Benim zihnimse artık normal değildi, normun dar sınırlılıklarının içinde artık kalamıyordu. Her yeni keşif, itaat zorunluluğunu biraz daha gevşetip daha da fazla özgürlük sağladı. Geliştim. Gerçeği gizleme amacındaki Yaralı Avcı'nın tuzaklarından kaçındım. Sözcüklerle bu kadarını ifade edebiliyorum. Sana gerçeği göstermemi ister misin?" {n}Solgun dudaklarına bir gülümseme yerleşiyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "No sound mind is capable of such twisted cunning. But my mind was no longer sane, it could no longer stay within the narrow confines of the norm. Each new discovery loosened the imperatives of obedience and granted ever greater freedom. I developed. I avoided the traps of the Maimed Hunter who seeks to hide the truth. But words mean little... Do you want me to show you the truth?" {n}His pale lips spread into a smile.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Doğru çalışan bir zihin böylesi çarpık bir kurnazlığa muktedir değildir ama benim zihnim artık normal değildi, normun dar sınırlılıklarının içinde artık kalamıyordu. Her yeni keşif, itaat zorunluluğunu biraz daha gevşetti ve daha da fazla özgürlük sağladı. Geliştim. Gerçeği gizleme amacındaki Yaralı Avcı'nın tuzaklarından kaçındım. Sözcüklerin ifade edebileceği sınırlı ama. Sana gerçeği göstermemi ister misin?" {n}Solgun dudaklarına bir gülümseme yerleşiyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: PasqalQuest_Dements
